document.title: AI Gadgets 2025: Smarter Living
document.excerpt: Discover the top AI-powered gadgets of 2025 that make your life easier—from personal assistants to smart health trackers.

body.raw:
## Smarter Living with AI

AI in 2025 is everywhere—from your kitchen to your car. These gadgets not only save time but also personalize your daily routine.

### Quick Picks
- AI-powered health tracker
- Smart cooking assistant
- AI-driven productivity tools

document.title: Remote Work Accessories 2025: Smarter Home Office
document.excerpt: Best accessories to upgrade your 2025 home office—ergonomics, 4K monitors, audio, docks & keyboards.

body.raw:
## Why It Matters

Working from home is here to stay. The right setup boosts comfort and productivity.

### Top Picks
- Adjustable laptop stand
- 27–32” 4K monitor
- USB-C hub with 100W passthrough
- Noise-cancelling headphones
- Compact mechanical keyboard
